}

func main() {

		}

	})
}

## Look up Existing HpcCluster Resource {#look-up}

## Import



cvm hpc_cluster can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import tencentcloud:Cvm/hpcCluster:HpcCluster hpc_cluster hpc_cluster_id
```

</dd>
</dl>
